articles.content: Apple's legal team has had a busy few weeks across the globe -- and the latest action could mean changes to basic things, like how we download apps, or how we message our friends, or what a future iP… [+1401 chars]

articles.author: Jim Norman
articles.title: Percentage Of Female Managers At Nintendo Hasn't Improved, Despite Pledges - Nintendo Life
articles.description: Annual report also reveals gender pay gap at NCL
articles.content:
Image: Nintendo
According to Nintendo's annual report published earlier this week, only 4.2% of company managers in Japan are women. This is a number that has remained unchanged since 2021, when the… [+2054 chars]

articles.title: Tarisland devs deny comparisons to World of Warcraft: "Tarisland is an original MMORPG with a fresh IP" - VG247
articles.description: Tarisland producer tells VG247 that their game is "an original MMORPG with a fresh IP" following accusations of plagiarism early this year.
articles.content: The developers behind Tarisland have told VG247 that it stands by its game as "an original MMORPG with a fresh IP", following numerous comparisons to World of Warcraft were made towards the game earl… [+2829 chars]
